lead_paragraph: The Library Lions gala commemorates the 50th anniversary of Truman Capote’s Black & White Ball.

headline.print_headline: Formality Aside, Gala Honors Library Lions
headline.main: Harry Belafonte, Peggy Noonan and Carolina Herrera at New York Public Library Gala

snippet: The Library Lions gala commemorates the 50th anniversary of Truman Capote’s Black & White Ball....
abstract: Scores of luminaries arrive at New York Public Library for its annual Library Lions gala.
